translation: The Blessed Lord said, "O Arjuna, neither in this world nor in the next will there be destruction for him; none, indeed, who does good, O my son, ever comes to grief."
commentary: 6.40 Partha O Partha, na not, eva verily, iha here, na not, amutra in the next world, vinashah destruction, tasya of him, vidyate is, na not, hi verily, kalyanakrit he who does good, kashchit anyone, durgatim bad state or grief, Father O My son, goes goes.Commentary He who has not succeeded in attaining perfection in Yoga in this birth will not be destroyed in this world or in the next world. Surely he will
